Package fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.player.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
RealPlayer, VirtualPlayer
public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a player with all his characteristics and his actions. It is abstract because we have 2 types of player, a real player and a virtual player.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(java.lang.String name, AbstractBoard b)
      Player's constructor. Sets up parameters and create 2 lists: one for player rounds' scores and one for player's hand.
      Parameters:
      name - the player's name.
      b - the game's board.
